name: DJ Shmup
description:
In this shoot-'em-up, you control the character and level by rewinding discs representing your movement, your fire-rate, and the boss' movement. Destroy all enemies to proceed to the next wave.

Discs (Press the key or drag the disc with the mouse to rewind):

  • Movement (White) – Z
  • Shooting (Yellow) – X
  • Boss Movement (Red) – C

Using the keyboard is more intuitive, but dragging with the mouse allows for more precise and quick controls.

Made for Brackeys Jam 2020.2
